api_list.api_description: Returns the textual content of a chapter of text.

required_parameters.name: urn
required_parameters.description: URN specifying the text to return.

api_list.api_description: Retrieve the definition of the specified English word.

required_parameters.name: word
required_parameters.description: The word to get the definition for.

query: Please retrieve the text from the URN 'ctp:analects/xue-er'. Also, I would like to know the definition of the English word 'philosophy'.
